Primary Contact: Candice Berry, Executive Director; Phone: 778.753.5830 ext 106; Email: cberry@lprc.ca
Alternate Contact: Kim Kinakin; Phone: 778.753.5830 ext 105; Email: menshealth@lprc.ca
Service Details: - Provides support, prevention, and education with a focus on wellness for people living with, affected by, or at-risk for HIV/AIDS, viral hepatitis, and other sexually transmitted blood borne infections- Provides a variety of harm reduction supplies for safer sex and substance use, and naloxone for the reversal of opioid overdose- Assists in connecting individuals to services addressing health, housing, and income, and creates and nurtures support networks within the community
Hours: Interim Drop in Hours: Monday - Friday, 10am-12pm
